37
B. Combining the ontology meta-model with 
a mapping model
•
Localization at the 
conceptual layer.
•
Each monolingual 
ontology structure 
knowledge is mapped 
to the rest of 
ontologies in a pair-
wise way
•
Less intuitive from 
the abstraction 
viewpoint
1. Binary mappings in an orthogonal graph.
